abstract: Jonathan Mahler On Soccer column reflects on legacy of goalkeeper Hope Solo in light of her suspension from United States women's national team over comments she made about rival Swedish team at 2016 Olympics; notes Solo is unlikely to play goalie for US team ever again.

headline.main: Hope Solo’s Behavior, and Play, Spells End With U.S. Team

keywords.value: United States Women's National Soccer Team
keywords.name: organizations

snippet: Solo, one of soccer’s most talented goalkeepers, has had her contract with the national squad terminated after a series of episodes that cast her in a bad light, but also after a shaky performance at the Rio Olympics....
lead_paragraph: Solo, one of soccer’s most talented goalkeepers, has had her contract with the national squad terminated after a series of episodes that cast her in a bad light, but also after a shaky performance at the Rio Olympics.
